title: Cosmic Odyssey
description: An epic journey through space and time as humanity searches for a new home among the stars. Stunning visuals and thought-provoking themes make this a must-see cinematic experience.

title: The Last Detective
coverImageUrl: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg width='400' height='600' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cdefs%3E%3ClinearGradient id='g2' x1='0%25' y1='0%25' x2='100%25' y2='100%25'%3E%3Cstop offset='0%25' style='stop-color:%232c3e50;stop-opacity:1'/%3E%3Cstop offset='100%25' style='stop-color:%2334495e;stop-opacity:1'/%3E%3C/linearGradient%3E%3C/defs%3E%3Crect width='400' height='600' fill='url(%23g2)'/%3E%3Ctext x='200' y='280' font-family='Arial' font-size='28' font-weight='bold' fill='white' text-anchor='middle'%3EThe Last%3C/text%3E%3Ctext x='200' y='320' font-family='Arial' font-size='28' font-weight='bold' fill='white' text-anchor='middle'%3EDetective%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E
description: A hardboiled detective faces his most challenging case yet in this neo-noir thriller. As the bodies pile up, he must confront demons from his past to catch a killer.

title: Laugh Out Loud
coverImageUrl: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg width='400' height='600' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cdefs%3E%3ClinearGradient id='g3' x1='0%25' y1='0%25' x2='100%25' y2='100%25'%3E%3Cstop offset='0%25' style='stop-color:%23f39c12;stop-opacity:1'/%3E%3Cstop offset='100%25' style='stop-color:%23e74c3c;stop-opacity:1'/%3E%3C/linearGradient%3E%3C/defs%3E%3Crect width='400' height='600' fill='url(%23g3)'/%3E%3Ctext x='200' y='280' font-family='Arial' font-size='32' font-weight='bold' fill='white' text-anchor='middle'%3ELaugh Out%3C/text%3E%3Ctext x='200' y='320' font-family='Arial' font-size='32' font-weight='bold' fill='white' text-anchor='middle'%3ELoud%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E
description: A hilarious comedy about a struggling comedian who accidentally becomes an internet sensation. Feel-good entertainment perfect for the whole family.

title: Eternal Love
coverImageUrl: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg width='400' height='600' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cdefs%3E%3ClinearGradient id='g4' x1='0%25' y1='0%25' x2='100%25' y2='100%25'%3E%3Cstop offset='0%25' style='stop-color:%23ec4899;stop-opacity:1'/%3E%3Cstop offset='100%25' style='stop-color:%23f43f5e;stop-opacity:1'/%3E%3C/linearGradient%3E%3C/defs%3E%3Crect width='400' height='600' fill='url(%23g4)'/%3E%3Ctext x='200' y='290' font-family='Arial' font-size='36' font-weight='bold' fill='white' text-anchor='middle'%3EEternal%3C/text%3E%3Ctext x='200' y='330' font-family='Arial' font-size='36' font-weight='bold' fill='white' text-anchor='middle'%3ELove%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E
description: A timeless love story that spans decades. Two souls destined to be together face the challenges of life, war, and time itself in this emotional journey.

title: Shadow Warriors
coverImageUrl: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg width='400' height='600' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cdefs%3E%3ClinearGradient id='g5' x1='0%25' y1='0%25' x2='100%25' y2='100%25'%3E%3Cstop offset='0%25' style='stop-color:%2316a085;stop-opacity:1'/%3E%3Cstop offset='100%25' style='stop-color:%2327ae60;stop-opacity:1'/%3E%3C/linearGradient%3E%3C/defs%3E%3Crect width='400' height='600' fill='url(%23g5)'/%3E%3Ctext x='200' y='290' font-family='Arial' font-size='32' font-weight='bold' fill='white' text-anchor='middle'%3EShadow%3C/text%3E%3Ctext x='200' y='330' font-family='Arial' font-size='32' font-weight='bold' fill='white' text-anchor='middle'%3EWarriors%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E
description: An elite team of special operatives must stop a global threat in this explosive action thriller. Non-stop adrenaline from start to finish.

title: The Haunting Hour
coverImageUrl: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg width='400' height='600' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cdefs%3E%3ClinearGradient id='g6' x1='0%25' y1='0%25' x2='100%25' y2='100%25'%3E%3Cstop offset='0%25' style='stop-color:%238e44ad;stop-opacity:1'/%3E%3Cstop offset='100%25' style='stop-color:%239b59b6;stop-opacity:1'/%3E%3C/linearGradient%3E%3C/defs%3E%3Crect width='400' height='600' fill='url(%23g6)'/%3E%3Ctext x='200' y='280' font-family='Arial' font-size='28' font-weight='bold' fill='white' text-anchor='middle'%3EThe Haunting%3C/text%3E%3Ctext x='200' y='320' font-family='Arial' font-size='28' font-weight='bold' fill='white' text-anchor='middle'%3EHour%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E
description: A family moves into a seemingly perfect house, only to discover it harbors dark secrets. Terrifying supernatural horror that will keep you on the edge of your seat.
